block_comment: This block of Verilog code is responsible for sequential data writing into a FIFO buffer. Specifically, it executes the write operation when the 'fifo_wr' control signal is set to high during the positive edge of the clock signal. In this situation, the 'fifo_wdata' is written into the FIFO buffer represented by the '$write' system function. As a synchronously controlled function, the write operation exhibits firm coherence with the timing diagram of the system clock.
